title: Noam Chomsky - Interview: Just Prior to Israeli Attack on Lebanon - Audio only
description:
1982 - 04 - xx

Noam Chomsky - Interview: Just Prior to Israeli Attack on Lebanon

In April of 1982, Noam Chomsky appeared on a radio talkshow to discuss events in the Middle East, focusing especially on Israel and Lebanon.
